model_answer: The correct chronological order of events is: (1) She greets the audience, saying "Hey guys, welcome back, my name is Haley," while standing behind a table of travel items. (2) On-screen social handles and a red SUBSCRIBE button appear as she asserts she can pack for seven nights in a small under-seat personal item bag. (3) She holds up a clear plastic roll-up compression bag with a blue zipper and calls it “amazing.” (4) Holding brown shoes, she advises wearing the bulkiest pair to the airport and stuffing socks/underwear/jewelry inside the shoes. (5) She rolls dresses into clear bags, says “alright,” and places another bag into the suitcase as upbeat electronic music plays. (6) A bag audibly drops with a thud and she says “easy peasy” after giving bra and underwear packing tips. Therefore, the correct order is option B: 1 -> 2 -> 4 -> 3 -> 5 -> 6.

The correct chronological order is: (1) She recommends using a small crossbody purse as a personal item and notes she’s never been stopped, while ensuring it fits in the suitcase. (2) She showcases a wire organizing bag from eBags to keep chargers together so they don’t float around the bag. (3) She explains she often ships toiletries via Amazon Prime and then demonstrates fitting travel sizes into a good-sized toiletry bag. (4) She lists what she’s packing: four dresses, three pairs of shorts, four shirts, plus a bikini and cover-up. (5) She packs a maxi dress into a clear bag, rolls the air out, says “alright,” and slides another bag into the suitcase as electronic music plays. (6) She gives bra and underwear packing tips, a bag drops with an audible thud, and she quips “easy peasy.” (7) She wraps up by discussing budget airline upgrades, mentioning a $39 Orlando fare, and points out the bag’s charger compartment.

Therefore, the answer is A: 2 -> 1 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6 -> 7.
